text: Taikhan ke prokahit kori diya kotha to taikhan nimite nohoi, kintu jitia taikhan pora utu kotha khan koi dise juntu etiya apnikhan ke Isor laga susamachar prochar kora khan pora sorgo pora aha Pobitro Atma dwara apnikhan ke koi dise - etu kotha khan sorgodoth khan bhi etu khobor janibole bisi itcha korise.
